introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This app will help manage Global Fund ADEx Metadata. The Global Fund may periodically release new versions of the ADEx metadata package. ADEx administrators can use this app to facilitate upgrading existing GFADex metadata packages to the latest version. Using this app will not affect any existing data or metadata, as it is designed to only work with GFADEx metadata. This app can also be used to export locally configured GFADEx exchange indicators and data exchange configuration to a JSON file which you can then import into another DHIS2 instance.

download-package.title: Download the latest GFADEx metadata package
download-package.content: Go to GitHub via this link and download the latest version of the GFADEx metadata package. Save this file to a local computer.

upload-to-datastore.title: Upload the GFADEx reference metadata to the DHIS2 datastore.
upload-to-datastore.content: Select the file downloaded from the previous step to upload and click "Upload GFADEx package". This will store a copy of the GFADEx reference metadata package in the local datastore.  This step is required for a new server GFADEx setup.

import-local.title: Import GFADEx metadata
import-local.content: Once the previous steps are completed, click the "Import GFADEx Metadata" button below. This will import the GFADEx metadata into the DHIS2 instance. This process may take a few minutes to complete. Once the process completes, a summary will display below.

update-local.title: Update GFADEx metadata
update-local.content: Once the previous steps are completed, click the "Update GFADEx Metadata" button below. During this process, your local GFADEx indicators will be upgraded. Your existing numerator definitions will be preserved. This process may take a few minutes to complete. Once the process completes, a summary will display below.

json-invalid: The JSON file you uploaded is invalid. Please check the file and try again.

backup-config.title: Backup GFADEx configuration
backup-config.content: Before proceeding, please backup the current GFADEx configuration. This will ensure a copy exists in the event something goes wrong during the update process. Click the "Backup GFADEx configuration" button below to proceed.

no-remote-metadata: No GFADEx reference metadata package found in the datastore. Please upload the GFADEx reference metadata package to the datastore and try again
no-local-gfadex-indicators: No GFADEx configuration found. Go back to start by importing the GFADEx reference metadata.
upgrade-error: Error upgrading existing GFADEx metadata. Please try again.

export-local-config.title: Export GFADEx configuration
export-local-config.content: When it is time to move the GFADEx configuration to another DHIS2 instance, click the "Export GFADEx configuration" button below. This will export only the configured GFADEx metadata, as well as the data exchange requests, to a JSON file which can be saved locally.  This JSON file is imported into the destination DHIS2 instance. Note that only GFADEx indicators which have been configured in the local DHIS2 instance will be included!

import-package.title: Import GFADEx metadata package
import-package.content: Once the GFADEx reference metadata has been uploaded into the DHIS2 datastore, the GFADEx metadata package can be imported into the destination DHIS2 instance. Click the "Import package" button below to proceed. This will import the GFADEx reference metadata from the DHIS2 datastore into the destination DHIS2 instance.
import-package.existing-package-warning: A GFADEx metadata package already exisits. Importing the package will overwrite your existing GFADEx metadata. Please use the 'Upgrade' process instead.
